title: my extensions disappeared
content: My extensions disappeared today, for some reason. I added some back to the laptop I was working on, but when I switched to my other one, they were not there. Do extensions not sync? Add-ons are included in items being synced on my settings page. I was hoping to find they never disappeared from that laptop so I could see which ones to add back. I'm on a Windows 10 machine.
creator: docmon67

title: Why is firefox now starting to remove bookmarks from my bookmarks menue.
content: Why is Firefox now starting to remove bookmarks from my bookmarks menu. Several bookmarks have been repeatedly removed from my list. Just understand me, if you have started to sensor bookmarks , i will leave and use another browser. I am very disappointing with this browser. Open source and and a free community to share info. I guess you have also been taken over by big tech. Very sad, I guess it's Good Bye.
creator: axelhgruel

title: Unable to download ANYTHING using Firefox
content: All of a sudden, I am unable to download any type of file using Firefox. Other browsers (Chrome, Safari) work fine. All I get is an immediate "FAILED" message in the download dialog box. Firefox is up to date.
creator: berg

title: No tengo audio
content: Antes de ayer el audio en firefox dejó de funcionar de repente, en el resto de navegadores no tengo este prblema. He probado todo lo de la guía, instalado extensiones que slucinan problemas pero nada. Cuando reproduzco un vídeo comienza a sonar y se para de repente, no sé que hacer pero necesito solucionarlo ya de ya.
creator: andersh.pics

title: New browser install: where's my stuff?
content: When I installed Firefox 88, all my bookmarks disappeared, as well as my history. I use my history often, and rely on FFox to open on my last session. Whoops. How can I recover my history without migrating to another browser?
creator: artrosch
